short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays the current URL on Amazon

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shopii is a plugin that allows you to earn points whenever you shop on Amazon or any other associated business. At the end of the week we raffle prizes for everyone who has made a purchase
